modName: Lore-Friendly Followers - The Companions and the Silver Hand
summary: A set of two lore-friendly followers based around the Companions faction: Valdis, a new member of the Companions, and Karash, an agent of the Silver Hand. Also adds quests, in-game journals and notes for immersive backstory, and unique dialogue for both followers.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/6228/cooltext932967229.png[/img]
[img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/4496/cooltext932905122.png[/img]

A set of two lore-friendly followers based around the Companions faction: Valdis, a new member of the Companions, and Karash, an agent of the Silver Hand. Also adds quests, in-game journals and notes for immersive backstory, and unique dialogue for both followers.[/center]

[center][img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/2848/cooltext932940282.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/6695/cooltext932937431.png[/img]
[img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/3668/cooltext932890291.png[/img]
Valdis was born and raised in Skyrim and considers herself a Nord in spirit though she is an Imperial by blood.

[img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/2420/cooltext932987974.png[/img]
[img]http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/5944/cooltext932978710.png[/img]

[center][img]http://img547.imageshack.us/img547/7844/cooltext933029221.png[/img][/center]
author: stormwillow
